version_description:
-The madness is upon us! Use your head, follow your heart or trust your gut but get your picks in!
- NBA Streaming Guide : you can find streaming options available for a specific NBA game, and we'll link you directly to the right app for your viewing pleasure.
- Fixed loading issues with our Widget

Remember to sign up to play Tourney Pick’em in the @YahooFantasy

- Introducing Sports Reel - you can now watch all your favorite team highlights in one place, just go to the favorites tab.
- Added back the MLB Scoring Summary and added NHL 'Key Events' to the plays tab
- Don’t forget you can watch a free MLB game every day for FREE.

- Introducing the all-new Headlines section: Headlines are quick, high quality videos presented in an easy-to-view portrait format
- NFL Draft : Who will the Browns and 49ers pick?
- Fixed an issue with NBA Player Stats
- Don't forget you can watch a free MLB game every day!

- NBA Finals are here, check out the new NBA shot chart while following the game play by play.
- Crushed a couple of crashes

- Added WNBA Shot Charts
- Now you can watch the Free MLB Game of the day on your iPad
- Follow the #USMNT journey through the Gold Cup
- Finally check out the new Top League Headlines Videos on the scores tab

Bug fixes.

Changes from v6.10:
- WNBA Shot Charts
- Now you can watch the Free MLB Game of the Day on your iPad
- Follow the #USMNT journey through the Gold Cup
- Top League Headlines Videos on the Scores tab

Bug fixes:
- Football field view first-down line position
- Better handling of postponed games

Changes from v6.10:
- Now you can watch the Free MLB Game of the Day on your iPad
- WNBA Shot Charts
- Follow the #USMNT journey through the Gold Cup
- Top League Headlines Videos on the Scores tab

Never miss a touchdown!

Follow our live play-by-play for every game, check out stats and standings for your favorite team, and tune in on September 24th for free streaming access to the Baltimore vs. Jacksonville game.

• The “Watch” tab, where you can stream live games and catch today’s hottest highlights.
• Trending headlines section to keep you up to date on top sports news.
• New boxing section so you can follow every knockout.
• Note that the Alerts Center has moved to the left sidebar as “Notifications”.
• Slimmer news article cards.

Bug fixes:
• Fix for unintended re-subscription to trending news alerts.
• Fix for date navigation issues.

(iPhone X design update is coming soon)

Bug fixes and product enhancements.

Yahoo Sports has a new look! We've redesigned the app from top to bottom, to give it a cleaner and more modern feel.

Design changes include:
- new launch screen
- modern custom font
- expanded use of team colors on game pages
- updated navigation elements

The Favorites tab is now the Home tab. In addition to news about your favorite teams, it's where you'll find can't-miss original news from Yahoo Sports writers like Dan Wetzel, Chris Haynes, and Pete Thamel, plus a stream of top news across all sports.

Also check out the new updates on your iPad (which can now be used in portrait or landscape orientation)!

- Future Games on Home tab now shows game dates
- Fix for widget unable to load error during baseball games
- Fix for tennis matches date selection
- Added seed back to line score

Your official live-streaming home for the National Women's Soccer League!
- Stream 100+ matches from the biggest names in Women's Soccer right in the Watch Tab

Now streaming select Liga MX live matches!
- Watch the best of live Liga MX soccer in the Watch tab

But wait, we have more:
- Get ready for the Women's World Cup starting in June! #USWNT
- Restored missing MLB top/bottom inning info
- Resolved a number of Tennis & NASCAR issues
- Resolved an issue for iOS 11 users when displaying particular completed games
- We've listened to your feedback and we're happy to announce we've added support for AAF! Wait... er, um, never mind.

Yahoo and MGM have teamed up to give fans a new way to enjoy the sports they love, capping off a landmark partnership by launching an all-new in-app Sportsbook experience.

Features:
• Game odds, updating in real-time
• Game lines for Soccer, NFL, NBA, NCAA Football (and other sports as they return!)
• Exclusive betting news and video content

Disclaimer: Certain features are only available to those of legal age in Colorado, Indiana, New Jersey, and West Virginia. And as always, check out our free-to-play Yahoo Fantasy Slate game (now in the sidebar menu)!

Get a closer look into top NFL plays with PlayAR - the immersive way to watch key moments in augmented reality (AR) using just your phone's camera. Load up the field on your coffee table, select a play, then scale and control the angle you want to enjoy over and over again!
